headline: EIT SPOTCURE UV INTENSITY METER
categories.lvl1: Test & Measurement Equipment > Optical Test & Measurement Equipment
categories.lvl2: Test & Measurement Equipment  >  Optical Test & Measurement Equipment > Optical Power Meters
specstable:
Manufacturer EIT
Model Spotcure SP405
Other Information Measures UV intensity up to 19.99W/cm2
Accepts multiple light guide sizes 5, 7, and 10 mm, 7 and 10 mm adaptors included
Intensity range: 0-19.99W/cm2
Resolution: 10mW/cm2
Accuracy: ±5% typical, ±10% maximum
Display: 3 1/2 digit LCD
Configured to 395-445nm (UVV)
Battery-powered
Extended Description Details at EIT SpotCure SP 405.pdf
Weight 1 lb (0 kg)
